Body:
with mock.patch('requests.Session.request', side_effect=lambda **k: k):
    result = self.api.path.to.st.post(value=1)
    self.assertDictContainsSubset({'url': 'http://your.dom.in/path/to/st',
        'method': 'POST', 'value': 1}, result)
with mock.patch('requests.Session.request', side_effect=NotImplementedError):
    with self.assertRaises(NotImplementedError):
        result = self.api.path.to.st.post(value=1)
    with mock.patch('ifv.http_api.SimpleHTTPAPI._on_request_error',
        side_effect=lambda *a, **k: (id(self), True)):
        result = self.api.path.to.st.post(value=1)
        self.assertEqual(result, id(self))
mock.patch('ifv.http_api.SimpleHTTPAPI._get_result_from_response',
    side_effect=lambda r: r)
